testcase.name: Non-XDT Scenario matching filter test
testcase.description: Tests of non-XDT scenario matching filter.

variation.name: Non-Xdt portion of kanchenjunga has two elements mixed with dimensions, different interleaving than everest source
variation.description: Non-Xdt portion of kanchenjunga has two elements mixed with dimensions, different interleaving than everest source

variation.name: Non-Xdt portion of everest has two elements mixed with dimensions, different order than source, no match results
variation.description: Non-Xdt portion of everest has two elements mixed with dimensions, different order than source, no match results

variation.name: Non-Xdt portion of vinson has complex elements mixed with dimensions, to match everest source
variation.description: Non-Xdt portion of vinson has complex elements mixed with dimensions, to match everest source

variation.name: Non-Xdt portion of vinson has complex elements differing in detail from source, no match results
variation.description: Non-Xdt portion of vinson has complex elements differing in detail from source, no match results

variation.name: Non-Xdt portion of quark is empty, matching all other empty nonXdt portioins
variation.description: Non-Xdt portion of quark is empty, matching all other empty nonXdt portioins

variation.name: Source (everest) and match (kanchenjunga) have element attributes in different order, numerics equal but different syntax, and text with whitespaces around match (but not xml:space="preserve").
variation.description: Source (everest) and match (kanchenjunga) have element attributes in different order, numerics equal but different syntax. (Deferred, by commenting out, text with whitespaces around match (but not xml:space="preserve")).
